person.name: Don R. Clarke
person.description: Elder Don R. Clarke was sustained a member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 1, 2006, and a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy on April 2, 2011. He served as president of the Central America Area from 2007 to 2011 and also as a counselor during 2006-2007. He is currently serving as an assistant Executive Director in the Missionary Department and as area assistant for the Utah North, Utah Salt Lake City, and Utah South Areas.
